title: Didn't get free win in promos
body:
I've been in Silver II series to Silver I then I fell but when I returned back to the series I didn't get a free win .. can you explain that please ?
Thanx

replies.body:
[**Promo helper**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q1) is applied *when you lose your promos but make it right back into the series matches*, not when you drop a tier/rank and then make it to promos.

https://i.gyazo.com/48245414164e25a2df1d61126aafddf7.png

You can check that I didn't drop a rank or tier I was still in Silver II though .. Please check it

Thanks{{champion:103}}
well I didn't drop a tier/rank and I still didn't get my free win !! I started the series all over with no wins
